Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: {VV##117 : GHC.Types.Module | $k_##118}{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module GHC.Base_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import GHC.CString_LHAssumptions()
 6: import GHC.Exts_LHAssumptions()
 7: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 8: import GHC.Base
 9: import Data.Tuple_LHAssumptions()
10: 
11: {-@
12: 
13: assume GHC.Base.. :: forall <p :: b -> c -> Bool, q :: a -> b -> Bool, r :: a -> c -> Bool>.
14:                    {xcmp::a, wcmp::b<q xcmp> |- c<p wcmp> <: c<r xcmp>}
15:                    (ycmp:b -> c<p ycmp>)
16:                 -> (zcmp:a -> b<q zcmp>)
17:                 ->  xcmp:a -> c<r xcmp>
18: 
19: measure autolen :: forall a. a -> GHC.Types.Int
20: 
21: //  Useless as compiled into GHC primitive, which is ignored
22: assume GHC.Base.assert :: {v:Bool | v } -> a -> a
23: 
24: instance measure len :: forall a. [a] -> GHC.Types.Int
25:   len []     = 0
26:   len (y:ys) = 1 + len ys
27: 
28: invariant {v: [a] | len v >= 0 }
29: assume GHC.Base.map       :: (a -> b) -> xs:[a] -> {v: [b] | len v == len xs}
30: assume GHC.Base.++        :: xs:[a] -> ys:[a] -> {v:[a] | len v == len xs + len ys}
31: 
32: assume (GHC.Base.$)       :: (a -> b) -> a -> b
33: assume GHC.Base.id        :: x:a -> {v:a | v = x}
34: 
35: qualif IsEmp(v:GHC.Types.Bool, xs: [a]) : (v <=> (len xs > 0))
36: qualif IsEmp(v:GHC.Types.Bool, xs: [a]) : (v <=> (len xs = 0))
37: 
38: qualif ListZ(v: [a])          : (len v =  0)
39: qualif ListZ(v: [a])          : (len v >= 0)
40: qualif ListZ(v: [a])          : (len v >  0)
41: 
42: qualif CmpLen(v:[a], xs:[b])  : (len v  =  len xs )
43: qualif CmpLen(v:[a], xs:[b])  : (len v  >= len xs )
44: qualif CmpLen(v:[a], xs:[b])  : (len v  >  len xs )
45: qualif CmpLen(v:[a], xs:[b])  : (len v  <= len xs )
46: qualif CmpLen(v:[a], xs:[b])  : (len v  <  len xs )
47: 
48: qualif EqLen(v:int, xs: [a])  : (v = len xs )
49: qualif LenEq(v:[a], x: int)   : (x = len v )
50: 
51: qualif LenDiff(v:[a], x:int)  : (len v  = x + 1)
52: qualif LenDiff(v:[a], x:int)  : (len v  = x - 1)
53: qualif LenAcc(v:int, xs:[a], n: int): (v = len xs  + n)
54: 
55: @-}
